}} 'Clonidine' (trade name Kapvay or Nexiclon) is a sympatholytic medication
used to treat high blood pressure, ADHD, anxiety/panic disorder, and certain
pain conditions. It is classified as a centrally acting Î± 2 adrenergic
agonist. An alternative hypothesis that has been proposed is that clonidine acts
centrally as an imidazoline receptor agonist.
